documents.document: I enjoy how Antonio Conte is very charming but would probably suffocate you if you annoyed him
Left the house at 6 am for my first training session leaving Cherry Orchard now at 10 20pm for my last session
@Alan_Honeyman I've had even more water I'm an athlete these days I'm class
So far today I've had 1.5L of water, 500 ml Blueberry Aloe Vera drinks, a Vit Hit and a coffee and I'm only up 2 hours,any news yourself,no?
I'd be class on Special Forces: Ultimate Hell Week because I'm well hard like a lettin on Rambo
I'd be class on Dragons Den because the 2 ladies would offer me whatever I wanted, the women can't get enough of me I'm a class act 😎

The song Millwall come out to is the best sing a long I've experienced in a ground, all proper cockneys having a right proper knees up 🙌
Wow I enjoyed that immensely #FrancisBacon #ABrushWithViolence
I get so excited for documentaries it's actually a bit sad #FrancisBacon #ABrushWithViolence
Documentary about my favourite artist Francis Bacon on BBC2 at 9, why would you want to be out!? fab fab fab fab x

Having my beloved Thai green curry Friday and listening to the War on Drugs, any news yourself, no!?

Morning off still in bed watching Art of Conflict on Netflix about the murals in Northern Ireland,any news yourself!?
Craig Gordon to Chelsea, well random.
